amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the U.S. may continue intelligence collection, analysis, and sharing operations with other nations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-8 to ensure that the U.S. may continue intelligence collection, analysis, and sharing operations with other nations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 177 (Roll no. 81).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Buck.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 177 (Roll no. 81).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
